snippet: Never a natural at team sports, a middle-aged man, inspired by his son’s skill and fearlessness, has rediscovered a teenage yearning to play hockey, despite frequent tumbles.
abstract: Box Seats article by journalist and hockey dad Mark Rotella describes how a middle-aged man, inspired by his 7-year-old son's skill and fearlessness, has rediscovered a teenage yearning to play hockey, despite frequent tumbles and aching ribs.
lead_paragraph: Never a natural at team sports, a middle-aged man, inspired by his son’s skill and fearlessness, has rediscovered a teenage yearning to play hockey, despite frequent tumbles.

headline.main: Father Shares, and Looks Up to, Son’s Love of Hockey
headline.print_headline: On Ice, a Father Looks Up to a Son
